Node.name: Listen
Node.Commands: lastReaction = listen ( ); print ( "Got Outside Message " + lastReaction.type );

Comment.Text: ask if the child wants to play

When started say hello and if know make comment on eyecolor

Node.name: N28
Node.Commands: return = { type = "acknowledgement" , subtype = situation }; emitDialogueAct ( return );

Comment.Text: Test if any parameter is given - no => select random of the possibilities - yes => test if one of the possible parameters is given
